name: Unknown
summary: Seasoned RN with leadership roles including Assistant Director of Nursing, Practice Leader, and Director of Care Delivery; extensive experience in long-term care, home health, infusion therapy, oncology, and staff development; seeking part-time RN roles, tutoring, online triage, or case management including oncology/hospice.

experience.title: Assistant Director of Nursing (ADON)
experience.description: Hired as ADON for an 85-90 bed long-term care facility for mentally and physically disabled individuals; responsibilities included staffing of all nurses, organizing transportation for outside MD visits, monitoring 3 nursing units, on-call duties, twice-monthly Manager on Duty (MOD), conducting in-services, responding to critical changes, and assisting with hospital transfers.

experience.title: Home Health Nurse
experience.description: Secured a Home Health position in Oak Park, IL; performed home visits, basic assessments, documented changes, contacted physicians as needed, administered injections/infusions, and participated in one clinical trial.

experience.title: Registered Nurse
experience.description: Part-time home visits; position limited and duties reduced; left roster when other opportunities arose.

experience.title: Infusion Nurse
experience.description: Worked part-time on infusion cases; travel requirements were challenging; remained on roster but rarely called.

experience.title: Director of Care Delivery (DCD)
experience.description: Promoted from Supervisor to DCD; managed a 40-bed locked dementia unit and later a 60-bed long-term care unit; duties included leading nursing unit, setting priorities, staff development, upholding corporate standards, infection control, QA, interdisciplinary meetings, falls and skin injury investigations, new admissions care planning, monthly staff meetings, and involvement in hiring and disciplinary actions.

experience.title: RN / Asst. Head Nurse Practice Leader
experience.description: Responsible for 24-hour unit management including staffing, scheduling, and payroll; supervised RNs, NCTs, and unit clerks; assisted with interviews, disciplinary actions, and mandatory education; organized in-services; supported computerization and scheduling; involved in PICC line program and training; promoted to Practice Leader; managed diverse surgical populations and isolation protocols; monitored patient satisfaction and staff performance.

experience.title: Staff Nurse, Surgical / 23-hour Observation Unit
experience.description: Staff RN in Surgical / 23-hour Observation Unit; later promoted to Practice Leader; responsibilities included patient care, charting, and coordination with interdisciplinary teams.

experience.title: Practice Leader
experience.description: Promoted to Practice Leader (equivalent to Assistant Head Nurse); oversaw unit operations, computer implementation, scheduling and payroll duties; led PICC Line program records and ensured competency; maintained certifications.
